auth.dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Log In
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Password reset link sent to your email
auth.resetPasswordFailed: Failed to send password reset link

home.soloModeDesc: You're currently in solo mode. Connect with a partner to unlock all BondQuest features and start strengthening your relationship together.
home.connectDesc: To use BondQuest, you need to connect with your partner first.
home.relationshipAppDesc: BondQuest is designed for couples. Connect with your partner to access all features and start strengthening your relationship.
home.errorDesc: We couldn't connect you with a partner. You can try again or continue in solo mode.
home.dailyChallengeDesc: Take the 'How Well Do You Know' quiz to earn points and strengthen your bond
home.competitionDesc: Compete with other couples to win exciting prizes and boost your bond strength
home.selfAssessmentDesc: Discover more about yourself and your relationship needs

journey.dailyMessage: Complete these activities to strengthen your relationship today
journey.morningCheckInDesc: Start your day with a relationship boost
journey.dailyQuizDesc: Test how well you know each other
journey.appreciationMomentDesc: Share what you appreciate about your partner
journey.relationshipMilestoneDesc: Celebrate a special moment in your relationship

proactiveAI.title: AI Assistant Suggestion
proactiveAI.suggestion1: Try expressing appreciation to your partner daily. Research shows that gratitude strengthens relationships significantly.
proactiveAI.suggestion2: This weekend might be perfect for a 'remember when' date night. Reliving positive memories builds attachment.
proactiveAI.suggestion3: Based on your quiz answers, you may have different love languages. Understanding this can reduce misunderstandings.

ai.errorSendingMessage: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

onboarding.welcomeMessage: Welcome to BondQuest! I'm Aurora, your relationship scientist. I'm here to help you build a stronger bond with your partner by assessing 10 key dimensions of your relationship. To get started, could you tell me your name?
onboarding.chatCompletedDescription: Thanks for sharing! Now let's connect you with your partner.
onboarding.skipAssistantConfirm: Are you sure you want to skip the AI assistant onboarding?
onboarding.skipAssistantDescription: You'll miss personalized relationship insights, but you can always come back later.

profile.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

bond.dimensionsDescription: Measure and track the strength of your relationship across key dimensions
bond.takeAssessmentToSee: Take an assessment to see your bond strength
bond.connectPartnerToSee: Connect with a partner to see your bond strength
bond.connectToAssess: Connect with a partner to take the assessment
bond.thankYouMessage: Thank you for completing the assessment. Your bond strength has been updated.
bond.insightsDescription: Generate personalized insights for the following dimensions:
bond.completeAssessment: Complete an assessment to receive personalized insights
bond.connectToUnlock: Connect with a partner to unlock relationship insights
